title: Guitar Overdrive Pedal (V1)
description: Reference design for a compact through-hole overdrive pedal using JFET input stage and op-amp clipping.

title: Hi-Fi Tube Pre-Amp (V1)
description: Two-stage 12AX7 pre-amplifier with regulated B+ and relay-switched input selector.

title: Classic Clean Boost (V1)
description: MOSFET-based clean boost pedal with up to 20 dB gain.

title: Vintage Fuzz Face Clone (V1)
description: Germanium-transistor fuzz with bias trimmer and true-bypass.

title: PT2399 Digital Delay (V1)
description: Up to 600 ms delay using PT2399 chip, mix and repeats control.

title: BBD Chorus (V1)
description: MN3207 bucket-brigade chorus with LFO rate/depth controls.

title: Belton Brick Reverb (V1)
description: Digital reverb module implementation with mix control.

title: Optical Compressor (V1)
description: LED/LDR cell compressor with threshold and sustain controls.

title: JFET Tremolo (V1)
description: Amplitude-modulation tremolo using JFET as variable resistor.

title: 4-Stage OTA Phaser (V1)
description: LM13700-based variable-phase network with feedback resonance.

title: 6-Band Graphic EQ (V1)
description: Gyrator-based active equaliser covering 100 Hz–3.2 kHz.

title: JFET Buffer (V1)
description: Low-noise input buffer with unity gain and high input impedance.

title: Diode Ring Modulator (V1)
description: Classic four-diode ring modulator with carrier oscillator and mix control.

title: MN3005 Analog Delay (V1)
description: 320 ms vintage analog delay with MN3005 BBD and compander noise reduction.

title: Spring Reverb Driver (V1)
description: Accutronics tank driver and recovery amplifier with tilt EQ.

title: CMOS Octave Down (V1)
description: CD4013 flip-flop octave divider with clean blend control.

title: Analog Cab Simulator (V1)
description: Multi-band gyrator network emulating 4×12 cabinet frequency response.

title: VCO – Basic Saw/Square (V1)
description: Temperature-compensated exponential VCO core (CEM3340) with sync and PWM.

title: VCF – Moog Ladder 24 dB (V1)
description: Discrete transistor ladder low-pass VCF with resonance control.

title: VCA – Linear/Expo (V1)
description: Dual THAT2180/LM13700 OTA VCA with switchable response curve.

title: Envelope Generator – ADSR (V1)
description: Analog ADSR with loop mode and voltage control over each segment.

title: Quad LFO (V1)
description: Four independent triangle/square LFOs with sync and CV input.

title: Sample & Hold + Noise (V1)
description: White/pink noise source with 4016 S&H clocked by external trigger.

title: Sequencer – 8-Step (V1)
description: Analog 8-step CV sequencer with gate output and clock input.

title: Ring Modulator – Linear (V1)
description: Four-quadrant Gilbert cell ring modulator for clean linear modulation.

title: Analog BBD Delay 4096-Stage (V1)
description: MN3208/3207 based delay module with voltage-controlled clock.

title: Low-Pass Gate – Vactrol (V1)
description: Dual vactrol low-pass gate in resonant & non-resonant modes.

title: Wavefolder – Serge Style (V1)
description: Bipolar JFET-based wavefolder with symmetry and drive controls.

title: Clock Divider – Cascade (V1)
description: CD4017/4024 divider generating /2 to /32 gate outputs.

title: Logic – Dual Boolean (V1)
description: Dual-input AND/OR/XOR logic module with diode-based and CMOS options.

title: Quantizer – Semitone (V1)
description: ADC/DAC based CV quantizer locking pitch to 12-TET semitones.

title: Mixer – 4-Channel Linear (V1)
description: AC-coupled op-amp mixer with unity gain and summed output.

title: Attenuverter – Dual (V1)
description: Two channels of bi-polar CV attenuation/inversion with offset.

title: Slew Limiter – Dual (V1)
description: Twin slew limiter with independent rise/fall control per channel.

title: Random Source – SSG (V1)
description: Stepped and smooth random voltage generator inspired by Serge SSG.

title: Multiple – Buffered (V1)
description: Unity-gain op-amp buffered 1-to-4 CV/audio mult for signal integrity.

title: Switch – 4-Step Sequential (V1)
description: CD4017 driven rotary sequential switch with manual advance.
